document_data.name: Prudence Tarkwold
document_data.mainbody: '''Prudence Tarkwold''' was a [[Zhentarim]] agent who lived in the village of [[Easthaven]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: While Prudence posed as a simple clerk in Easthaven's [[Town Hall (Easthaven)|town hall]], she lived a double life as a spy and informant for the Black Network.
document_data.Relationships:
Prudence had no true loyalty to Easthaven's Speaker [[Danneth Waylen]], and would readily betray him if the right opportunity presented itself. Her loyalty lay solely with the Zhentarim, who she considered her one and true family.

She kept a pet [[flying snake]] that served as her own personal messenger.
